purpose: To provide a flexible framework for developing and experimenting with AI agents
principle: Built on a modular architecture allowing for the integration and coordination of multiple AI agents
reusability: Offers a plug-and-play architecture with API support for integrating custom agents and workflows
limitations: Alpha stage, may have limited documentation and stability, primarily for experimental use
name: project-oagents
highlight: Framework for creating, managing, and orchestrating AI agents with a focus on experimental development
